mapper.insert: INSERT INTO treatment_case_info ( treatment_case_id, treatment_id, operator_date, place, clinical, first_visit, advice, title_tag, user_id, remark, status, delete_flag, data_version, create_date ) VALUES ( #{treatmentCaseId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{treatmentId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operatorDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{place, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clinical, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{firstVisit, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{advice, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{titleTag, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 1, 0, 1, now() )
mapper.update:
UPDATE treatment_case_info
operator_date = #{operatorDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
place = #{place, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
clinical = #{clinical, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
first_visit = #{firstVisit, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
advice = #{advice, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
title_tag = #{titleTag, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status, jdbcType=INTEGER},
delete_flag = #{deleteFlag, jdbcType=INTEGER}
WHERE treatment_case_id = #{treatmentCaseId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT a.treatment_case_id treatmentCaseId, a.operator_date operatorDate, a.place place, a.clinical clinical, a.first_visit firstVisit, a.advice advice, a.title_tag titleTag, a.remark remark, c.horse_name horseId, b.horse_type horseType, b.horse_name horseName FROM treatment_case_info a INNER JOIN treatment_info b ON a.treatment_id = b.treatment_id LEFT JOIN horse_info c ON c.horse_id = b.horse_id WHERE a.delete_flag = 0 AND a.treatment_case_id = #{treatmentCaseId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT a.operator_date operateDate, a.clinical realname, a.title_tag titleTag, a.place place, c.realname realname FROM treatment_case_info a LEFT JOIN treatment_info b ON a.treatment_id = b.treatment_id LEFT JOIN user_info c ON a.user_id = c.user_id WHERE a.delete_flag = 0 AND a.status = 1 AND b.horse_id = #{horseId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY a.operator_date DESC limit 0, 4
